text: smallest learning curve language to work with CSV files
VBA is not cutting it for me anymore.
i have lots of huge excel files to which i need to make lots of calculations and break them down into other excel/csv files.
i need a language that i can pick up within the next couple of days to do what i need because it is kind of an emergency.
i have been suggested python, but i would like to check with you if there is anything else that does csv file handling quickly and easily.
